item.title: Operating System Interview Question Answers
item.author: Sayef
item.description: 1. What is an operating system? An operating system is a program that acts as an intermediary between the user and the computer hardware. The purpose of an OS is to provide a convenient environment in which user can execute programs in a convenient and efficient manner. 2. What are the different operating systems? Batched operating systems Multi-programmed operating systems Time sharing operating systems Distributed operating systems Real-time operating systems 3.
